## ContextExplorerConfig type

Options to configure Context Explorer

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type ContextExplorerConfig = {
    path?: string;
    enableInspection?: boolean;
    enableSVG?: boolean;
    enableD3Animation?: boolean;
};
```
